name: coursera_search
description: Search for courses on Coursera. Returns up to 15 results with course name, provider, rating, enrollment count, difficulty level, and URL.

steps.code: const results = []; const items = document.querySelectorAll('[data-testid="search-result"], [class*="result-card"], li[class*="ais-"], [class*="ProductCard"]'); if (items.length === 0) { const altItems = document.querySelectorAll('a[href*="/learn/"], a[href*="/specializations/"], a[href*="/professional-certificates/"]'); const seen = new Set(); for (let i = 0; i < altItems.length && results.length < 15; i++) { const el = altItems[i]; const href = el.getAttribute('href') || ''; if (seen.has(href)) continue; seen.add(href); const titleEl = el.querySelector('h3, h2, [class*="title"], strong'); if (!titleEl) continue; const providerEl = el.querySelector('[class*="partner"], [class*="provider"], p'); const ratingEl = el.querySelector('[class*="rating"] span, [class*="stars"]'); const imgEl = el.querySelector('img'); results.push({ name: titleEl.textContent.trim(), provider: providerEl ? providerEl.textContent.trim() : '', rating: ratingEl ? ratingEl.textContent.trim() : '', image: imgEl ? imgEl.getAttribute('src') : '', url: href.startsWith('http') ? href : 'https://www.coursera.org' + href }); } } else { for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(items.length, 15); i++) { const el = items[i]; const titleEl = el.querySelector('h3, h2, [class*="title"], [data-testid="result-title"]'); const providerEl = el.querySelector('[class*="partner"], [class*="provider"], [data-testid="result-provider"]'); const ratingEl = el.querySelector('[class*="rating"] span, [class*="stars"] span, [data-testid="result-rating"]'); const enrollmentEl = el.querySelector('[class*="enrollment"], [class*="students"]'); const levelEl = el.querySelector('[class*="level"], [class*="difficulty"]'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a[href*="/learn/"], a[href*="/specializations/"], a[href*="/professional-certificates/"]'); const imgEl = el.querySelector('img'); const typeEl = el.querySelector('[class*="type"], [class*="product-type"]'); results.push({ name: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', provider: providerEl ? providerEl.textContent.trim() : '', rating: ratingEl ? ratingEl.textContent.trim() : '', enrollment: enrollmentEl ? enrollmentEl.textContent.trim() : '', level: levelEl ? levelEl.textContent.trim() : '', type: typeEl ? typeEl.textContent.trim() : '', image: imgEl ? imgEl.getAttribute('src') : '', url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '' }); } } return { query: `{{query}}`, result_count: results.length, results: results }
